detail.title: Flag Theory and New Brazilian Global Mobility: An Exploratory Study on European Jurisdictions and Fiscal Optimization in Contemporary Diaspora (A Teoria das Bandeiras e a Nova Mobilidade Global Brasileira: Um Estudo Exploratório sobre Jurisdições Europeias e Otimização Fiscal na Diáspora Contemporânea)
detail.abstract:
English abstract: This study examines the application of flag theory strategies by Brazilian nationals in contemporary global mobility patterns, focusing on European jurisdictional diversification and fiscal optimization mechanisms. Using qualitative methodology combining literature review, institutional data analysis, and digital community content examination, we investigate how Brazilian citizens implement multi-jurisdictional strategies encompassing citizenship acquisition, tax residence optimization, and business incorporation. The research identifies three distinct implementation profiles: digital entrepreneurs (32%), specialized professionals (45%), and investor-rentiers (23%). Portugal emerges as the primary European hub, facilitating 67% of Brazilian EU mobility through linguistic affinity and favorable tax regimes. The study contributes empirically to understanding contemporary South-South and South-North migration patterns while providing policy insights for both origin and destination jurisdictions managing high-skilled mobility flows.

Portuguese abstract: Este estudo investiga a aplicação de estratégias da teoria das bandeiras por cidadãos brasileiros em contextos contemporâneos de mobilidade global, com foco na diversificação jurisdicional europeia e mecanismos de otimização fiscal. A pesquisa qualitativa analisou literatura recente, dados institucionais e conteúdo de comunidades digitais. Foram identificados três perfis principais: empreendedores digitais (32%), profissionais especializados (45%) e investidores-rentistas (23%). Portugal destacou-se como hub europeu preferencial (67% dos fluxos UE). O estudo oferece subsídios empíricos para compreender os padrões migratórios Sul-Sul e Sul-Norte, além de propor diretrizes para políticas públicas no Brasil e nas jurisdições de destino.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨巴西国民在全球流动性模式中应用旗帜理论策略的情况，重点关注欧洲的司法多样化和税收优化机制。通过定性方法，研究发现三类实施策略的人群：数字企业家（32%）、专业人士（45%）和投资者（23%）。葡萄牙是主要欧洲枢纽，占巴西欧盟流动性的67%。

title: Smarten V2.0: A Scalable Framework for Multiscale Energy Forecasting in Interconnected Buildings Toward Smarter Grid Management
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Antananarivo, University of Reunion Island, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Smarten V2.0: A Scalable Framework for Multiscale Energy Forecasting in Interconnected Buildings Toward Smarter Grid Management
detail.abstract: As the global energy sector moves toward decentralized and renewable systems, accurate forecasting tools are crucial for optimizing energy management and grid operations. This study presents enhancements to the SMARTEN v2.0 framework, a cutting edge time series forecasting algorithm designed to predict energy consumption and production with high precision. A key innovation is its scaling technique, which adjusts for seasonal and daily fluctuations, improving reliability in dynamic environments. SMARTEN v2.0 was tested using high-resolution datasets from two distinct locations: the Mafate microgrid in a tropical climate with minimal seasonal variation, and the GreEn-ER building in a semi continental mountainous region. These contrasting sites provided a robust basis for evaluating the model’s adaptability across diverse energy profiles. Performance metrics including RMSE, R², and MAE demonstrate SMARTEN v2.0’s strong ability to replicate energy trends, particularly under stable conditions. In both annual and monthly simulations, the model closely matches measured values, confirming its effectiveness in capturing long-term energy dynamics. Importantly, the normalized RMSE (nRMSE) remains below 20%, aligning with benchmarks found in scientific literature for similar forecasting studies. This supports the model’s credibility and places its predictive accuracy within accepted standards. However, the model faces challenges when forecasting irregular consumption patterns, such as those occurring during weekends and public holidays. These anomalies highlight the need for further refinements to improve accuracy in scenarios with non-standard behavior. Despite these limitations, SMARTEN v2.0 performs reliably in contexts involving photovoltaic production and consistent energy use.

AI.tldr: SMARTEN v2.0框架通过改进时间序列预测算法，优化了能源消费和生产的预测精度，尤其在稳定条件下表现优异，但在非标准行为场景（如节假日）中仍需进一步改进。
AI.research_question: 如何通过改进时间序列预测算法（SMARTEN v2.0）提高能源消费和生产的预测精度？
AI.motivation: 随着全球能源系统向分散式和可再生能源转型，准确的预测工具对优化能源管理和电网运营至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 时间序列预测算法、季节性调整技术。
AI.method: 使用高分辨率数据集（来自热带气候的Mafate微电网和半大陆山区的GreEn-ER建筑）测试SMARTEN v2.0的性能。
AI.findings: 模型在稳定条件下表现优异（nRMSE低于20%），但在非标准行为场景（如节假日）中预测能力有限。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种改进的时间序列预测框架，增强了季节性调整能力。
AI.practical_contributions: 为能源管理系统提供了高精度的预测工具，支持电网优化运营。

title: Unsupervised Anomaly Detection in Industrial Iot: One-Class Tensor-Train Machine with Randomized Mapping
affiliations: Huaihua University, Hunan First Normal University, Huaihua University, Huaihua University and Huaihua University

detail.title: Unsupervised Anomaly Detection in Industrial Iot: One-Class Tensor-Train Machine with Randomized Mapping
detail.abstract: The Industrial Internet of Things has generated substantial amounts of high-dimensional tensor data, making anomaly detection crucial for manufacturing safety and efficiency.  The one-class support vector machine, intended for vector-based data, frequently struggles to manage the intricacies of large-scale IIoT data.  To address these restrictions, we provide the One-Class Support Tensor-Train Machine (1CSTTM), an innovative framework that extends OCSVM to tensor space through Tensor Train decomposition.  This method diminishes computational and storage complexity from exponential to polynomial, facilitating scalable processing of extensive datasets.  We also introduce Randomized 1CSTTM (R1CSTTM), which utilizes random Fourier characteristics to approximate nonlinear tensorial kernels, therefore enhancing scalability and precision.  Thorough trials on actual IIoT data demonstrate that both methods exceed contemporary techniques in accuracy, efficiency, and robustness.  R1CSTTM demonstrates outstanding performance while significantly reducing training and inference durations, validating its effectiveness for large-scale anomaly detection in industrial applications.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为1CSTTM的新框架，通过张量分解将OCSVM扩展到张量空间，解决了工业物联网高维张量数据的异常检测问题，并进一步提出了R1CSTTM以提高可扩展性和精度。实验证明这两种方法在准确性、效率和鲁棒性上优于现有技术。
AI.research_question: 如何高效且准确地检测工业物联网中的高维张量数据异常？
AI.motivation: 工业物联网产生的高维张量数据对传统向量方法（如OCSVM）提出了挑战，需要一种更高效且可扩展的异常检测方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于张量分解和随机傅里叶特征的理论框架，扩展了OCSVM到张量空间。
AI.method: 提出了1CSTTM和R1CSTTM两种方法，分别通过张量分解和随机傅里叶特征降低计算复杂度并提高精度。
AI.findings: 实验表明，1CSTTM和R1CSTTM在准确性、效率和鲁棒性上优于现有技术，尤其R1CSTTM显著减少了训练和推理时间。
AI.theory_contributions: 将OCSVM扩展到张量空间，提出了基于张量分解和随机傅里叶特征的新理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为工业物联网中的大规模异常检测提供了高效且可扩展的解决方案，提升了制造安全和效率。

detail.abstract: This paper examines the convergence dynamics of inflation, economic development, and exchange rates in six North African countries-Algeria, Egypt, Libya, Mauritania, Morocco, and Tunisiafrom 1980 to 2024. The analysis uses a unique econometric approach, including panel unit root tests, multivariate convergence and stability models, and Dumitrescu-Hurlin panel causality tests, to determine whether these macroeconomic variables show symptoms of convergence and dependency. The findings suggest statistically significant but diverse convergence tendencies, with better synchronization in Morocco, Tunisia, Algeria, and Libya, while Egypt and Mauritania continue to diverge. Notably, the analysis finds strong bidirectional causality between inflation, exchange rates, and economic growth, underscoring inflation's critical role in regional macroeconomic interactions. Conversely, the weak causal relationship between exchange rates and growth highlights structural impediments to effective monetary transmission. These findings have significant implications for policy coordination, inflation targeting, and regional monetary integration, particularly in the context of a possible North African monetary union. The paper suggests specific convergence tactics and structural reforms to improve macroeconomic alignment and integration throughout the area.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了1980年至2024年间六个北非国家（阿尔及利亚、埃及、利比亚、毛里塔尼亚、摩洛哥和突尼斯）的通胀、经济发展和汇率的收敛动态，发现各国收敛趋势多样，通胀在区域宏观经济互动中起关键作用。
AI.research_question: 北非六国的通胀、经济发展和汇率是否存在收敛和依赖关系？
AI.motivation: 探讨北非国家宏观经济变量的收敛动态，为区域货币一体化提供政策建议。
AI.theoretical_framework: 收敛理论、宏观经济互动理论。
AI.method: 面板单位根检验、多元收敛与稳定性模型、Dumitrescu-Hurlin面板因果检验。
AI.findings: 摩洛哥、突尼斯、阿尔及利亚和利比亚收敛趋势显著，埃及和毛里塔尼亚则分化；通胀与汇率和经济增长存在双向因果关系。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了通胀在区域宏观经济互动中的关键作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策协调、通胀目标和区域货币一体化提供了具体建议。

detail.abstract: This study examines how a shock-dependent Phillips Curve affects economic growth and exchange rate changes in six African nations between 1980 and 2024. Using PSVAR, CIR, and panel GLM approaches, the study shows how inflation affects economic growth and exchange rates differs by country and shock type. Key findings include the negative consequences of supply-side shocks in structurally weak countries, as well as different exchange rate reactions influenced by monetary frameworks. The paper emphasizes the importance of structural determinants and policy credibility in managing inflation and exchange rate volatility, and it recommends state-contingent monetary policies as well as improved transmission channels.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了冲击依赖的菲利普斯曲线如何影响1980年至2024年间六个非洲国家的经济增长和汇率变化。通过PSVAR、CIR和面板GLM方法，研究发现通胀对经济增长和汇率的影响因国家和冲击类型而异。主要发现包括供给冲击对结构脆弱国家的负面影响，以及受货币框架影响的不同汇率反应。论文强调了结构决定因素和政策可信度在管理通胀和汇率波动中的重要性，并建议采用状态依赖的货币政策及改进传导渠道。
AI.research_question: 冲击依赖的菲利普斯曲线如何影响非洲国家的经济增长和汇率变化？
AI.motivation: 理解通胀对经济增长和汇率的影响在不同国家和冲击类型下的差异，为政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 冲击依赖的菲利普斯曲线、经济增长理论、汇率决定理论。
AI.method: PSVAR（面板结构向量自回归）、CIR（冲击响应分析）、面板GLM（广义线性模型）。
AI.findings: 供给冲击对结构脆弱国家有负面影响；汇率反应受货币框架影响；结构因素和政策可信度对管理通胀和汇率波动至关重要。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了冲击依赖的菲利普斯曲线在非洲国家的应用，强调了国家和冲击类型的异质性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议采用状态依赖的货币政策及改进传导渠道，为政策制定者提供具体指导。

title: Capital Efficiency Switch: A Framework for Optimizing Intercompany Liquidity in Multinational Enterprises
affiliations: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Madras

detail.title: Capital Efficiency Switch: A Framework for Optimizing Intercompany Liquidity in Multinational Enterprises

declarations.declarationOfInterest: I declare that there are no conflicts of interest, financial or otherwise, that have influenced the development of this research. This paper represents original, independent work solely conducted and authored by the undersigned researcher.
declarations.ethicsApproval: This study does not involve human participants, medical subjects, or sensitive personal data. It is a conceptual and policy-driven financial research paper and does not require formal ethics approval.
declarations.funderStatement: This research was not funded by any external agency, institution, or corporate entity. It was developed independently as part of an individual academic and professional research initiative.

detail.abstract: Multinational corporations (MNCs) and financial institutions frequently encounter liquidity challenges stemming from intercompany transfer restrictions, foreign exchange (FX) spreads, repatriation tax liabilities, and regulatory capital controls. These pervasive constraints lead to the phenomenon of "trapped liquidity," significantly impeding optimal capital allocation and diminishing operational efficiency. This paper introduces the Capital Efficiency Switch (CES), a comprehensive legal-financial engineering framework designed to enable internal liquidity optimization across diverse jurisdictions without breaching existing tax, FX, or regulatory boundaries. By strategically utilizing synthetic financial positions, intelligent legal entity structuring, internal hedging mechanisms, and matched domestic funding arrangements, CES creates economic equivalence to capital movement without initiating physical crossborder transfer events. The framework's practical applicability and tangible benefits are illustrated through successful implementations within Fortune 500 corporations and global financial institutions. This framework has enabled global firms to unlock over $1 billion in idle liquidity and reduce FX and tax costs by up to 40% in some jurisdictions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了资本效率转换（CES）框架，通过法律金融工程解决跨国公司和金融机构的流动性困境，优化资本配置。
AI.research_question: 如何在不违反税收、外汇或监管限制的情况下优化跨国公司和金融机构的内部流动性？
AI.motivation: 跨国公司和金融机构面临流动性困境，如转移限制、外汇利差和税收负担，导致资本配置效率低下。
AI.theoretical_framework: 法律金融工程、合成金融头寸、内部对冲机制和匹配的国内融资安排。
AI.method: 采用CES框架，结合智能法律实体结构、内部对冲和匹配融资，实现经济等效的资本流动。
AI.findings: 成功案例显示，CES框架帮助全球企业释放超过10亿美元闲置流动性，并在某些地区减少40%的外汇和税收成本。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个综合的法律金融工程框架，为跨国流动性优化提供了新的理论视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 实际应用中，CES显著提升了资本效率，降低了成本，适用于全球企业和金融机构。

title: The Need For Regulation Of Private Equity: Evidence From De-Spac Transactions
affiliations: Sabanci University - School of Management, University of Michigan, Stephen M. Ross School of Business and University of Michigan, Stephen M. Ross School of Business

detail.title: The Need For Regulation Of Private Equity: Evidence From De-Spac Transactions

contentType.other: Accepted for publication, not yet published

detail.abstract: In this Article, we examine whether regulation is needed to protect investors in private equity. We do this by analyzing the performance of de-SPAC transactions that solicited private investment. These private investments in public equity are known as PIPEs. Because PIPE returns are publicly available, we are empirically able to determine whether the limited PIPE investors are getting a fair deal in these investments. We find that de-SPAC investors lose about forty-five percent of their investment within two years of the de-SPAC transactions. Furthermore, we find that almost all these losses are limited to those cases when the SPAC sponsors resort to PIPE financing, losing about fifty-five percent of their value abnormally. Hence, our evidence suggests that limited private-fund investors suffer substantial and systematic losses when they make PIPE investments in de-SPAC transactions. Our evidence at least partially justifies the SEC's new rules regarding the regulation of the private funds industry. Moreover, the need to address this matter has become more urgent in light of the August 7, 2025 Executive Order further opening pension funds' access to private equity markets, thus also exposing the retirement investments of retail investors to these risks.

AI.tldr: 本文研究是否需要监管以保护私募股权投资者，通过分析de-SPAC交易中私募投资的绩效，发现投资者在两年内损失约45%，且损失主要集中于PIPE融资情况，损失率达55%。研究支持SEC对私募基金行业的新规。
AI.research_question: 是否需要监管以保护私募股权投资者？
AI.motivation: 私募投资在de-SPAC交易中可能面临系统性损失，且养老金市场进一步开放可能加剧零售投资者风险。
AI.theoretical_framework: 私募股权投资绩效分析，监管必要性理论。
AI.method: 实证分析de-SPAC交易中PIPE投资的公开回报数据。
AI.findings: 投资者在de-SPAC交易中两年内损失45%，PIPE融资情况下损失55%。
AI.theory_contributions: 为私募股权投资监管提供理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 支持SEC新规，呼吁加强对私募基金市场的监管以保护投资者。

title: Climate Disclosure in the Global South
affiliations: University of São Paulo (USP) and Harvard Law School

detail.title: Climate Disclosure in the Global South

publicationDetails.detailsText: European Corporate Governance Institute - Law Working Paper No. 868/2025
publicationDetails.journalName: European Corporate Governance Institute (ECGI) - Law Working Paper Series

detail.abstract:
This Chapter examines the emerging landscape of corporate climate disclosure in the Global South, focusing on Brazil, India, China, and South Africa (“BICS”), and compares the adoption of international standards by the largest economies in both the Global South and North. We analyse these early developments in view of three perspectives on Global South regulatory tendencies: (i) the resistance view, predicting opposition to climate change measures due to developmental concerns, (ii) the foreign influence view, suggesting greater susceptibility to international standards, and (iii) the legal heterodoxy view, positing that Global South jurisdictions develop legal innovations incorporating broader public policy objectives. We find diverse patterns combining elements of all three views.

Strikingly, all ten jurisdictions examined in the Global South and North have adopted some form of corporate climate disclosure in the last decade. However, following the withdrawal of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s defence for its climate rule in 2025, the U.S. stands out as the only major jurisdiction lacking a dedicated federal climate disclosure framework. Consistent with the foreign influence view, Brazil was the first jurisdiction worldwide to adopt ISSB standards, while China modified these standards to include double materiality. We also observe evidence of legal heterodoxy, with South Africa and India implementing pioneering frameworks for sustainability reporting that anticipated the European Union’s emphasis on double materiality.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了全球南方国家（巴西、印度、中国和南非）企业气候信息披露的现状，并与全球北方国家进行比较。研究发现，这些国家在采纳国际标准时表现出多样性，结合了三种理论视角：抵抗观点、外国影响观点和法律异质性观点。
AI.research_question: 全球南方国家在采纳企业气候信息披露国际标准时表现出哪些特点？
AI.motivation: 研究全球南方国家在气候信息披露方面的早期发展，以理解其与全球北方国家的差异及其背后的理论驱动。
AI.theoretical_framework: 三种理论视角：抵抗观点、外国影响观点和法律异质性观点。
AI.method: 比较分析巴西、印度、中国、南非等全球南方国家与全球北方国家的企业气候信息披露实践。
AI.findings: 全球南方国家在采纳国际标准时表现出多样性，巴西率先采纳ISSB标准，中国修改标准以纳入双重重要性，南非和印度则实施了创新的可持续发展报告框架。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了三种理论视角在全球南方国家气候信息披露实践中的适用性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了全球南方国家气候信息披露实践的实证依据，有助于国际标准的进一步优化。

title: Anomaly Detection in Manual Assembly Using Mmwave Sensor Data: A Deep Learning Approach with Cnn-Gru and Tfts
affiliations: Sakarya Üniversitesi, Sakarya University and University of Iowa

detail.title: Anomaly Detection in Manual Assembly Using Mmwave Sensor Data: A Deep Learning Approach with Cnn-Gru and Tfts
detail.abstract: Monitoring manual assembly processes for quality control and efficiency is critical in manufacturing. Deviations in operational timing or sequence can signal errors, operator fatigue, or inefficient workflows. This paper presents a non-invasive, intelligent monitoring system for detecting both timing and sequence anomalies in a repetitive manual assembly task using synchronized multi-modal sensors, spatio-temporal deep learning for state estimation, and advanced temporal modeling. The system integrates millimeter-wave (mmWave) radar (TI IWR6843ISK) for capturing hand motion, Time-of-Flight (ToF) sensors (VL53L0X-V2) for automated ground-truth labeling of box interactions, and optional video for debugging. A robust data collection pipeline, featuring detailed mmWave packet parsing, ensures frame-level synchronization across sensors via a centralized Frame ID generator. Raw sensor data is processed, and a CNN-GRU model is trained to estimate the current hand-box interaction state from spatio-temporal mmWave features. Subsequently, a Temporal Fusion Transformer (TFT) network is developed for state sequence anomaly detection, and a statistical Z-score approach is employed for state duration anomaly detection. We demonstrate the system's ability to learn normal operational patterns from baseline data and effectively detect deliberately introduced timing and sequence anomalies. Our results highlight the potential of this combined approach—synchronized multi-modal sensing, CNN-GRU state estimation, TFTs for sequence analysis, and statistical methods for timing—for robust, real-time monitoring of manual industrial processes.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种非侵入式智能监控系统，通过多模态传感器和深度学习技术检测手动装配任务中的时序和顺序异常。
AI.research_question: 如何利用多模态传感器和深度学习技术实时监测手动装配任务中的时序和顺序异常？
AI.motivation: 手动装配过程中的偏差可能导致错误、操作员疲劳或低效工作流，因此需要一种高效的监控方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合毫米波雷达、ToF传感器和视频数据，利用CNN-GRU模型进行状态估计，TFT网络进行序列分析，以及Z-score方法进行时序异常检测。
AI.method: 采用同步多模态传感器采集数据，通过CNN-GRU模型估计状态，TFT网络检测序列异常，Z-score方法检测时序异常。
AI.findings: 系统能够从基线数据中学习正常操作模式，并有效检测人为引入的时序和顺序异常。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合多模态传感器和深度学习技术的实时监控框架，扩展了工业过程监控的理论方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为制造业提供了一种高效、非侵入式的实时监控解决方案，有助于提升质量控制和工作效率。

title: A Novel Reverse Virtual Sample Generation Method Via Output-Reconstructed Global-Local Cgan for Industrial Soft Sensing
affiliations: Heilongjiang University, Heilongjiang University and Heilongjiang University

detail.title: A Novel Reverse Virtual Sample Generation Method Via Output-Reconstructed Global-Local Cgan for Industrial Soft Sensing
detail.abstract: Soft sensing technology has been widely applied in predicting key quality indicators for complex industrial processes. However, the scarcity of modeling data caused by physical equipment limitations and high measurement costs severely restricts the modeling performance. To address above challenge, this paper proposes a reverse virtual sample generation (VSG) method named output-reconstructed global-local conditional generative adversarial network (ORGL-CGAN). Specifically, a decomposition-reconstruction framework is employed in ORGL-CGAN, which decomposes target output data into high-frequency and low-frequency components. During reconstruction, white noise is added to the high-frequency components to enhance sample diversity, while the low-frequency components are preserved to maintain the primary data characteristics. Furthermore, the ORGL-CGAN framework integrates a gating mechanism to fuse global features extracted via multi-head attention mechanism with local features derived from convolutional operations. This design endows the model to simultaneously handle global information processing and local detail description, thereby improving the quality of generated virtual samples. A three-dimensional numerical case and an industrial debutanizer column case are employed to validate the effectiveness and superiority of the proposed method. Experimental results demonstrate that ORGL-CGAN can generate high-quality virtual samples with strong distributional alignment to original data, which are beneficial for enhancing the soft sensing model performance.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为ORGL-CGAN的反向虚拟样本生成方法，通过分解-重构框架增强样本多样性，并结合全局和局部特征提升虚拟样本质量，有效解决了工业过程中建模数据稀缺的问题。
AI.research_question: 如何解决复杂工业过程中因建模数据稀缺而导致的软测量性能受限问题？
AI.motivation: 物理设备限制和高测量成本导致建模数据稀缺，严重影响了软测量技术的性能。
AI.theoretical_framework: 分解-重构框架、生成对抗网络（GAN）、多头注意力机制和卷积操作。
AI.method: 提出ORGL-CGAN方法，将目标输出数据分解为高频和低频成分，通过添加白噪声增强多样性，并结合全局和局部特征提升样本质量。
AI.findings: 实验证明ORGL-CGAN能生成与原始数据分布高度对齐的高质量虚拟样本，显著提升软测量模型性能。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合全局和局部特征的虚拟样本生成框架，扩展了GAN在工业数据增强中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为工业过程提供了一种高效的数据增强方法，提升了软测量技术的实用性和可靠性。

title: Greasing at the Bottom of the Pyramid? The Role of Bribery, Informality, and Financial Access for African Innovators
affiliations: University of Southampton - Southampton Business School

detail.title: Greasing at the Bottom of the Pyramid? The Role of Bribery, Informality, and Financial Access for African Innovators

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No conflict of interest
declarations.funderStatement: NA

detail.abstract: The relationship between informal institutions and innovation remains poorly understood. In this study, I focus on bribery, a pervasive informal practice in many emerging markets and argue that in the African context, it exerts a positive (greasing) influence on firms' ability to introduce new product innovations. Furthermore, I propose two essential contingencies (i.e., informal competition and access to finance) that can affect this greasing effect in contrasting ways. These theoretical conjectures are tested using data on more than 10,000 firms across 37 African countries during the period 2011 to 2021. The empirical results reveal that bribery facilitates the introduction of new product innovations, with informal competition moderating negatively this relationship. Although financial accessibility stimulates directly firm innovation, it does not weaken the association between bribery and new product introductions. These findings provide novel insights into the dynamics of bribery and innovation, as well as their contextual contingencies in African markets.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了贿赂对非洲企业新产品创新的促进作用，并探讨了非正式竞争和融资渠道对此关系的调节作用。实证结果表明贿赂有助于创新，但非正式竞争削弱了这种关系，而融资渠道则无显著影响。
AI.research_question: 贿赂如何影响非洲企业的新产品创新能力？非正式竞争和融资渠道如何调节这种关系？
AI.motivation: 理解非正式制度（如贿赂）对创新的影响，尤其是在非洲新兴市场中的独特作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于非正式制度理论，探讨贿赂作为“润滑剂”对创新的影响，并引入非正式竞争和融资渠道作为调节变量。
AI.method: 使用2011至2021年间37个非洲国家超过10,000家企业的数据进行实证分析。
AI.findings: 贿赂促进新产品创新；非正式竞争负向调节这一关系，而融资渠道无显著调节作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了贿赂在非洲市场中对创新的独特作用，丰富了非正式制度与创新关系的理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于如何管理非正式制度以促进创新的实践启示。

title: From Relocation to Resilience: Donors’ Support for Displaced Business and Host Regions
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: From Relocation to Resilience: Donors’ Support for Displaced Business and Host Regions
detail.abstract: The displacement of business is a challenge for both a company and a host region. This study aims to explore the types of support donors provide, the challenges they encounter, and the impact of their programs on enhancing the resilience of displaced businesses while fostering the development of the host region. Performing in-depth interviews with donor organizations who support Ukrainian displaced businesses during the russian war intervention demonstrates how donors measure the impact and effectiveness of the aid programs, challenges of their application, needs of displaced businesses, and host regions covered by donors. The main idea is to deliver support effectively, donors should cover the needs of businesses and host regions, considering non-emergency and emergency times. Displaced business needs are logistics, mental health support, equipment displacement, support of displaced business employees, supply chain restoration, innovative development, new equipment, access to the new markets, contribution to the host community, and network. Information support infrastructure, physical infrastructure, innovative development, investment attractiveness, smart specialization industry companies’ support, supporting people (job market and new skills), and strengthening community measures are the primary needs of host regions. Financial and non-financial aid are equally important. The enhanced classification of donor organizations helped to develop a mapping donor, which shows the geographical and types of support organizations. This tool can be helpful to policymakers, donors, and businesses who intend to relocate. Insights received in this research might be helpful for policymaking, the development of donors’ strategies, and businesses that intend to relocate.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了捐助者为乌克兰战争期间流离失所的企业提供的支持类型、面临的挑战及其对增强企业韧性和促进接收地区发展的影响。研究发现，捐助者需同时满足企业和接收地区的需求，包括紧急与非紧急时期的支持。
AI.research_question: 捐助者为流离失所企业提供的支持类型、面临的挑战及其对企业和接收地区的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 企业和接收地区在流离失所过程中面临多重挑战，研究旨在探索如何通过捐助支持增强企业韧性并促进地区发展。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于企业韧性和区域发展的理论框架，探讨捐助支持的作用。
AI.method: 通过深度访谈捐助组织，分析其对乌克兰流离失所企业的支持情况。
AI.findings: 企业和接收地区的需求包括物流、心理健康、供应链恢复等；捐助者需提供财务与非财务支持，并开发工具（如捐助地图）以优化支持策略。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了企业韧性和区域发展中捐助支持的理论分类与作用机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者、捐助者和企业提供了实用的工具和策略建议，以优化支持效果。

title: Comparative Analysis of Natural Coagulants as Eco-Friendly Alternative for Water Purification
affiliations: Sardar Patel University and Sardar Patel University

detail.title: Comparative Analysis of Natural Coagulants as Eco-Friendly Alternative for Water Purification
detail.abstract: The increasing contamination of surface water due to industrial, agricultural and domestic activities has intensified the need for sustainable and eco-friendly treatment solution. The clean water is required for house hold needs, health security and environmental safety. Chemical coagulants are effective but pose serious health and environment risk due to residual toxicity. This study was done to check how well natural materials like Moringa seeds, banana peels, and Aloe vera can clean dirty water. Two types of water were tested: one from the Beas River and the other from drainage water. Before treatment, both water samples had high turbidity (cloudiness), low pH (acidic), and in the case of drainage water, a high amount of dissolved solids (TDS). After treating the water with natural coagulants, Moringa seeds worked the best, reducing turbidity to very low levels and also improving pH and TDS. Banana peel and Aloe vera also helped, but not as much as Moringa. The colour and smell of the water improved after treatment. Microbial tests also showed fewer bacteria in the treated water, especially in the samples treated with Moringa. This study proves that natural coagulants are eco-friendly, low-cost, and effective alternatives to chemicals for water purification.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了天然材料（如辣木种子、香蕉皮和芦荟）在净化受污染水源中的效果，发现辣木种子表现最佳，能显著降低浊度、改善pH值和总溶解固体（TDS），是一种环保、低成本且有效的化学替代品。
AI.research_question: 天然材料（如辣木种子、香蕉皮和芦荟）在净化受污染水源中的效果如何？
AI.motivation: 由于工业和农业活动导致地表水污染加剧，亟需可持续且环保的水处理方案。化学混凝剂虽有效但存在残留毒性风险，因此探索天然替代品具有重要意义。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于天然材料的混凝和吸附特性，探讨其对水质参数（浊度、pH、TDS）和微生物含量的影响。
AI.method: 测试了辣木种子、香蕉皮和芦荟对Beas河水和排水沟水的净化效果，分析处理前后的浊度、pH、TDS及微生物含量变化。
AI.findings: 辣木种子表现最佳，显著降低浊度并改善pH和TDS；香蕉皮和芦荟也有一定效果。处理后水的颜色和气味改善，微生物含量减少。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了天然材料作为环保混凝剂的理论可行性，丰富了可持续水处理技术的研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为发展中国家和资源匮乏地区提供了低成本、环保的水净化方案，减少对化学混凝剂的依赖。

title: Managing Uncertainty under Sudden Operational Closures: The Role of Implied Volatility, Positive Sentiment, and Productivity
affiliations: University of North Texas, Independent, Jonkoping University - Jonkoping International Business School (JIBS), Macquarie University, Macquarie Business School and University of Agder

detail.title: Managing Uncertainty under Sudden Operational Closures: The Role of Implied Volatility, Positive Sentiment, and Productivity
detail.abstract: Using the literature on epistemic and aleatory uncertainty and the theoretical framework on 'protecting the core,' we evaluate the impact of sudden operational closures under implied volatility, a revealed uncertainty, on stock market reaction. We propose three hypotheses about the relationship between implied volatility and firm performance under the positive sentiment and Total Factor Productivity (TFP). We use a comprehensive event study methodology to test the proposed hypotheses. We draw on Capital IQ's Key Development database, which provides operational closure events. Further, we merge the operations closures events with the Compustat data to obtain a sample of 1,501 US manufacturing firms with 10,883 events between 2002 and 2019. Though implied volatility is not significantly related to market performance, the relationship of implied volatility with a firm's market performance is strengthened by positive sentiment and TFP. The findings have implications for operations managers aiming to manage revealed uncertainty. This paper is the first attempt at empirically evaluating uncertainty management strategies under uncertainty conditions characterized by an environment of high implied volatility. The suspension of primary corporate operations reflects disruptions that must be carefully managed to improve business performance.

AI.tldr: 本文通过研究隐含波动率对股市反应的影响，结合积极情绪和全要素生产率（TFP），揭示了不确定性管理策略在运营关闭事件中的作用。
AI.research_question: 隐含波动率如何影响企业在运营关闭事件中的市场表现？
AI.motivation: 探讨在高度不确定性的环境中，企业如何通过管理运营关闭事件来提升市场表现。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于认知和偶然不确定性理论，以及'保护核心'的理论框架。
AI.method: 采用事件研究方法，结合Capital IQ和Compustat数据库，分析了2002年至2019年间1,501家美国制造企业的10,883个运营关闭事件。
AI.findings: 隐含波动率与市场表现无显著关系，但积极情绪和TFP强化了其对企业市场表现的影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 首次实证评估了高隐含波动率环境下的不确定性管理策略。
AI.practical_contributions: 为运营管理者提供了在不确定性环境中管理运营关闭事件的实践指导。

title: Deyo-Rl: A Real-Time Red-Light Violation Detection Framework for Mixed Urban Traffic
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Huddersfield, University of Huddersfield, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Future Cities Laboratory, Industrial University of Ho Chi Minh City and Vietnam National University Ho Chi Minh City

detail.title: Deyo-Rl: A Real-Time Red-Light Violation Detection Framework for Mixed Urban Traffic
detail.abstract: Red-light running (RLR) is identified as a significant issue in urban traffic management, contributing to severe accidents, substantial economic losses, and increased traffic congestion. In this paper, a novel real-time red-light violation detection framework, termed DEYO-RL, is proposed. This framework integrates vehicle detection and tracking based on deep learning methodologies with intelligent trajectory analysis. A hybrid detection architecture is utilized, combining YOLO’s computational efficiency with DETR’s transformer-based contextual understanding, which ensures high accuracy and robustness across diverse urban scenarios. Additionally, a Contrastive Denoising Module (CDM) is introduced to enhance detection stability. At the same time, a TinyDet module, featuring sparsely-connected convolution (SCConv), is employed to improve the recognition of small-sized vehicles. The tracking pipeline is developed using an enhanced ByteTrack algorithm, effectively reducing identity switches and track fragmentation in multi-object tracking scenarios. Moreover, a trajectory-based analysis module is incorporated to accurately differentiate illegal red-light violations from legitimate right-turn maneuvers, thereby significantly minimizing false positive detections. Experimental evaluations conducted on the UA-DETRAC and Vietnamese Vehicles datasets illustrate that DEYO-RL surpasses state-of-the-art models in both detection and tracking performance metrics while maintaining real-time operational capability. Therefore, the proposed framework presents a viable AI-driven solution for enhancing intelligent traffic enforcement and urban safety.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为DEYO-RL的实时闯红灯检测框架，结合深度学习和智能轨迹分析，显著提升了检测准确性和实时性。
AI.research_question: 如何通过深度学习和智能轨迹分析实现高精度、实时的闯红灯检测？
AI.motivation: 闯红灯是城市交通管理中的严重问题，导致事故、经济损失和交通拥堵，亟需高效解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于深度学习的车辆检测与跟踪技术，结合YOLO和DETR的混合架构，以及对比去噪模块（CDM）和TinyDet模块。
AI.method: 采用混合检测架构（YOLO+DETR）、CDM模块、TinyDet模块和增强的ByteTrack算法，结合轨迹分析模块。
AI.findings: 在UA-DETRAC和越南车辆数据集上，DEYO-RL在检测和跟踪性能上优于现有模型，同时保持实时性。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合深度学习和轨迹分析的新型框架，提升了闯红灯检测的理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 为智能交通执法和城市安全提供了高效、准确的AI驱动解决方案。

title: Spatial Biases in Process Flexibility
affiliations: University of Houston, University of Houston - Department of Decision & Information Sciences and University of Kent - Kent Business School

detail.title: Spatial Biases in Process Flexibility
detail.abstract: Spatial features play a crucial role in helping decision-makers navigate complex structures. This study experimentally explores how these features influence decisions related to process flexibility. Building on theories in spatial cognition, we design four treatments that lead to identical decision problems while varying in spatial and semantic features (i.e. link length and label correspondence). We find that the subject behavior differs significantly by treatments, revealing strong spatial bias in decision making. Two key behavioral patterns emerge. First, spatial accounting is evident as subjects consistently prefer short links over long ones. Second, spatial regret manifests as subjects irrationally adjusting links in response to underage and overage cues from prior demand realizations. Moreover, the two biases interplay: compared to long links, short links are more likely to be added when underage cues appear, and less likely to be removed under overage cues.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过实验探讨空间特征如何影响与流程灵活性相关的决策，发现决策行为因空间和语义特征的不同而显著差异，揭示了决策中的空间偏见。
AI.research_question: 空间特征如何影响与流程灵活性相关的决策？
AI.motivation: 空间特征在帮助决策者导航复杂结构中起关键作用，但对其如何影响具体决策行为的研究较少。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于空间认知理论。
AI.method: 设计了四种实验处理，通过改变空间和语义特征（如链接长度和标签对应关系）来观察决策行为。
AI.findings: 决策行为因处理不同而显著差异，表现出两种关键行为模式：空间会计（偏好短链接）和空间后悔（非理性调整链接）。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了决策中的空间偏见及其交互作用，丰富了空间认知理论的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为设计更有效的决策支持系统提供了实证依据，帮助减少决策中的空间偏见。

title: Executive Coercion and Legal Independence: Constitutional Analysis of Presidential Targeting of Law Firms
affiliations: Independent Scholar

detail.title: Executive Coercion and Legal Independence: Constitutional Analysis of Presidential Targeting of Law Firms

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No conflicts of interest to declare. This research was conducted independently without financial or personal relationships that could influence the study.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Not applicable. This study analyzes publicly available legal documents and court records without human subjects research
declarations.funderStatement: No external funding. This research was conducted as independent scholarship

detail.abstract: This study examines the first systematic presidential targeting of law firms in American constitutional history through analysis of executive orders issued against legal practitioners in 2025. Drawing on constitutional coercion doctrine from NFIB v. Sebelius, this research demonstrates how executive financial pressure against private legal entities creates novel constitutional violations beyond traditional federal-state coercion frameworks. Through empirical analysis of four federal court decisions unanimously striking down executive orders, documentation of nearly $1 billion in coercive settlements, and real-time analysis of professional chilling effects, this study establishes that systematic law firm targeting violates First Amendment speech and association rights, Due Process protections, and separation of powers principles. The research contributes to constitutional coercion scholarship by extending doctrinal analysis to private professional entities while providing empirical measurement of constitutional harm through judicial unanimity and professional behavior changes. Findings suggest that legal profession independence requires heightened constitutional protection as a structural democratic safeguard rather than merely individual professional rights.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过分析2025年针对法律从业者的行政命令，首次系统性地研究了美国宪法史上总统对律师事务所的针对性行为。研究发现，这种行政金融压力对私人法律实体造成了超越传统联邦-州胁迫框架的新型宪法侵犯。
AI.research_question: 系统性针对律师事务所的行为是否违反美国宪法中的言论自由、结社自由、正当程序及权力分立原则？
AI.motivation: 探讨行政命令对法律从业者的金融压力及其宪法影响，填补宪法胁迫学说在私人专业实体领域的空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于NFIB v. Sebelius案中的宪法胁迫学说，扩展至私人专业实体。
AI.method: 实证分析四项联邦法院一致否决行政命令的判决、近10亿美元的胁迫性和解文件，以及对专业寒蝉效应的实时分析。
AI.findings: 系统性针对律师事务所的行为侵犯了第一修正案的言论自由和结社自由权、正当程序保护及权力分立原则。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展宪法胁迫学说至私人专业实体，并通过司法一致性和专业行为变化实证衡量宪法损害。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出法律职业独立性需作为结构性民主保障而不仅仅是个人专业权利，需要更高的宪法保护。

title: Repetitive Error Selected Iterative Learning Contouring Control for Precision Multiaxis Systems
affiliations: Tsinghua University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Tsinghua University and Tsinghua University

detail.title: Repetitive Error Selected Iterative Learning Contouring Control for Precision Multiaxis Systems

keywords.keywords: Contour error；Multi-axis systems；Contouring Control；Iterative Learning Control；Repetitive Error Selected.

detail.abstract: The contour error control method based on Iterative Learning Control (ILC) has gained widespread application in multi-axis precision motion systems due to its excellent control accuracy. Fundamentally, ILC works by filtering both repetitive and non-repetitive errors over multiple repetitive control tasks, and iteratively compensating for the repetitive errors to achieve extremely high control precision. In engineering applications, the low-frequency components of errors are typically considered repetitive, while the high-frequency components are regarded as random and non-repetitive. Based on this, ILC often utilizes low-pass filters to filter out repetitive errors. However, the causes of multi-axis contour errors are far more complex than those of single-axis tracking errors. We believe that directly using frequency characteristics to distinguish whether contour errors are repetitive is insufficiently accurate, despite the extensive use of this approach in prior studies. Therefore, this paper proposes a novel ILC method for contour error control based on the selection of repetitive errors. The method determines whether the errors in corresponding frequency bands exhibit repetitive characteristics based on the spectral features of the contour errors, thus enabling more precise filtering of repetitive errors. This approach effectively avoids the issues of convergence speed and precision degradation caused by the introduction of non-repetitive components during the iteration process in traditional ILC. Furthermore, we conducted a series of validation experiments on a multi-axis motion platform, which fully demonstrate that the proposed method outperforms traditional methods under various experimental conditions, effectively addressing the shortcomings of ILC in error filtering.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于重复误差选择的迭代学习控制（ILC）方法，用于多轴轮廓误差控制，通过频谱特征更精确地过滤重复误差，避免了传统ILC中非重复成分引入的问题，实验验证了其优越性。
AI.research_question: 如何更精确地区分和过滤多轴轮廓误差中的重复与非重复成分，以提高迭代学习控制的精度和收敛速度？
AI.motivation: 传统ILC方法仅通过频率特性区分重复与非重复误差，在多轴轮廓误差控制中精度不足，导致收敛速度和精度下降。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于频谱特征的重复误差选择理论，结合迭代学习控制（ILC）框架。
AI.method: 提出一种基于重复误差选择的ILC方法，通过频谱分析确定误差的重复性，并精确过滤重复误差。
AI.findings: 实验证明，该方法在多轴运动平台上优于传统ILC方法，显著提高了控制精度和收敛速度。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了基于频谱特征的重复误差选择理论，丰富了ILC在多轴轮廓误差控制中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 提供了一种更精确的多轴轮廓误差控制方法，适用于高精度运动系统，提升了工程应用中的控制性能。

title: Ten Years of Internet-Based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy in Norway: A National Cross-Sectional Survey Examining Therapists And Their Acceptance of Icbt Using the Technology Acceptance Model
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Ten Years of Internet-Based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy in Norway: A National Cross-Sectional Survey Examining Therapists And Their Acceptance of Icbt Using the Technology Acceptance Model
detail.abstract: BackgroundInternet-based cognitive behavioral therapy (iCBT) has been available in Norwegian specialist mental health care for a decade. Despite strong evidence and national support, uptake remains limited, with little known about therapists delivering iCBT or factors influencing engagement.ObjectiveUsing an extended Technology Acceptance Model (TAM), this study aimed to provide a national overview of therapists delivering iCBT, their work environment, and acceptance, as well as explore group differences between clinics established through different implementation approaches.MethodsThe study identified all therapists using iCBT in routine care. Using a cross-sectional survey, data regarding therapists’ characteristics, their context, and TAM constructs was collected. Therapists were grouped by whether their clinics used bottom-up or top-down implementation approaches and compared on all TAM constructs.ResultsSixty-seven therapists were identified as actively delivering iCBT nationally. Of these, 45 therapists from 18 clinics responded (67% response rate). Therapists were experienced clinicians with varying backgrounds and work environments. High acceptance was found across all TAM dimensions except for Image. Therapists in clinics with structured top-down implementation and ongoing supervision reported highest acceptance.ConclusionDespite high therapist acceptance of iCBT, experienced loss in professional regard presents a cultural barrier hindering widespread adoption. Despite a decade of use, iCBT remains a small part of routine care. However, successful implementation across diverse therapist backgrounds is achievable, and mandated top-down implementation appears useful when supported by experienced supervision.

AI.tldr: 本研究使用扩展的技术接受模型（TAM），调查了挪威心理健康专科治疗师对互联网认知行为疗法（iCBT）的接受度，发现尽管治疗师普遍接受iCBT，但专业形象受损是阻碍广泛采用的文化障碍。
AI.research_question: 挪威心理健康专科治疗师对iCBT的接受度如何？不同实施方式的诊所之间是否存在差异？
AI.motivation: 尽管iCBT在挪威已有十年历史且证据充分，但其采用率仍然有限，缺乏对治疗师及其工作环境的了解。
AI.theoretical_framework: 扩展的技术接受模型（TAM）。
AI.method: 横断面调查，收集治疗师特征、工作环境和TAM构念数据，比较不同实施方式（自下而上与自上而下）的诊所。
AI.findings: 67名治疗师中45人参与调查，普遍接受iCBT，但“形象”维度得分较低。自上而下实施且有持续督导的诊所接受度最高。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了TAM在iCBT接受度研究中的适用性，并扩展了其文化维度（如专业形象）。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了实施iCBT的建议，强调自上而下实施和持续督导的重要性。

title: Reliable Markups in Noisy Data: A Case for Cost-Weighted Aggregation
affiliations: Tilburg University - Department of Economics

detail.title: Reliable Markups in Noisy Data: A Case for Cost-Weighted Aggregation
detail.abstract: This paper shows that the widely reported rise in aggregate markups over recent decades is overstated due to idiosyncratic measurement error in firm-level sales and costs. I first demonstrate theoretically that such error biases sales-weighted markups upward, while cost-weighted markups remain unaffected. Using production function estimation techniques, I then empirically estimate and correct for measurement error, and find that the increase in sales-weighted markups largely vanishes, aligning closely with cost-weighted trends. Together, these findings imply that the cost-weighted markup offers a more robust measure of market power in the presence of measurement error.

AI.tldr: 本文指出，由于企业层面销售和成本的测量误差，过去几十年广泛报道的总体加价上升被高估。理论分析表明，这种误差会导致销售加权加价向上偏误，而成本加权加价不受影响。通过生产函数估计技术，作者实证估计并校正了测量误差，发现销售加权加价的上升几乎消失，与成本加权趋势一致。这表明在存在测量误差时，成本加权加价是衡量市场力量的更稳健指标。
AI.research_question: 企业层面测量误差如何影响总体加价的估计？
AI.motivation: 过去几十年广泛报道的总体加价上升可能被高估，需要更准确的测量方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 测量误差对销售加权和成本加权加价的影响理论。
AI.method: 生产函数估计技术用于实证估计和校正测量误差。
AI.findings: 校正测量误差后，销售加权加价的上升几乎消失，与成本加权趋势一致。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出成本加权加价是衡量市场力量的更稳健指标。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和研究者提供了更准确的加价测量方法。

title: Dynamic Time-Series Feature Extraction for Blast Furnace Lining Temperature Prediction
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Tokyo University of Technology

detail.title: Dynamic Time-Series Feature Extraction for Blast Furnace Lining Temperature Prediction
detail.abstract: The lining temperature of the blast furnace is a key indicator for measuring the health of a blast furnace. By predicting the furnace lining temperature, unreasonable operations can be identified, and the thermal state of the blast furnace can be better controlled. However, due to the varying reaction time and the spatial distribution of the blast furnace ironmaking process, the influence of process parameters on the lining temperature exhibits dynamic time delay. To address this issue, a lining temperature prediction model incorporating dynamic feature extraction across numerous time series is presented, and an innovative attention mechanism is introduced to capture the dynamic features of time series. Finally, a convolutional neural network is employed to enhance the ability of the prediction model to perceive local temporal patterns. The originality lies in integrating gated recurrent units with attention mechanisms to address varying time delays among process variables, resulting in improved prediction accuracy compared to existing methods. Based on the actual production data, the feasibility and effectiveness of the model are demonstrated.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种结合动态特征提取和注意力机制的高炉炉衬温度预测模型，通过门控循环单元和卷积神经网络提升预测精度，验证了其在实际生产中的有效性。
AI.research_question: 如何解决高炉炉衬温度预测中因反应时间和空间分布导致的动态时间延迟问题？
AI.motivation: 高炉炉衬温度是衡量高炉健康状态的关键指标，准确预测可优化操作并控制热状态。
AI.theoretical_framework: 动态特征提取、注意力机制、门控循环单元（GRU）、卷积神经网络（CNN）。
AI.method: 结合动态特征提取和注意力机制，利用GRU和CNN构建预测模型。
AI.findings: 模型能够有效捕捉时间序列的动态特征，预测精度优于现有方法。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合GRU和注意力机制的动态时间延迟处理方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 模型在实际生产中验证了可行性，有助于优化高炉操作。

title: A Unified Preference Model for Hybrid Optimization: Enhancing Multiple Algorithms with User Feedback
affiliations: Beijing Institute of Technology, Beijing Institute of Technology and Beijing Institute of Technology

detail.title: A Unified Preference Model for Hybrid Optimization: Enhancing Multiple Algorithms with User Feedback
detail.abstract: Modern engineering design increasingly involves high-dimensional, multimodal, and tightly constrained search spaces, where conventional optimization methods exhibit limited efficiency and solution diversity. Hybrid frameworks combining complementary heuristics enhance global exploration but commonly rely on fixed switching rules, resulting in premature stagnation and prohibitive computational costs under complex landscape deformation. Although integrating human preferences can guide optimization, current implementations mostly utilize preferences for parameter tuning or weighting schemes rather than dynamic algorithm coordination. To address this limitation, we propose User Preference-Driven Hybrid Optimization with Dynamic Switching (UPHODS). UPHODS constructs a Gaussian-process surrogate that unifies designer-generated pairwise ranking feedback and objective metrics into a hybrid-utility surface. At each decision epoch, the framework dynamically selects the optimizer whose population maximizes expected hybrid utility. When projected gains surpass a hysteresis threshold, an elite subset preserving solution similarity warm-starts the selected algorithm. Experiments on high-dimensional benchmarks demonstrate a 10.66% average performance improvement over fixed-rule hybrids. In an industrial vehicle-body lightweighting scenario, UPHODS reduces design iterations by 18.5% and achieves 14.9% additional mass reduction, confirming the effectiveness of integrating user-defined preferences with utility-driven dynamic algorithm coordination in complex design tasks.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为UPHODS的用户偏好驱动混合优化框架，通过动态切换优化器并结合用户偏好，显著提升了高维复杂设计任务的效率和性能。
AI.research_question: 如何在高维多模态且约束严格的工程设计中，通过动态算法协调和用户偏好整合，提升优化效率和解决方案多样性？
AI.motivation: 传统优化方法在高维复杂设计空间中效率低且解决方案多样性不足，而现有混合框架依赖固定切换规则，导致过早停滞和高计算成本。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于高斯过程代理模型，将用户偏好与目标指标统一为混合效用表面，动态选择优化器。
AI.method: UPHODS框架通过动态切换优化器，结合用户偏好和效用驱动决策，实验验证其性能。
AI.findings: 在高维基准测试中平均性能提升10.66%，工业车辆轻量化场景中设计迭代减少18.5%，质量减轻14.9%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合用户偏好和动态算法协调的理论框架，扩展了混合优化方法的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 在复杂工程设计中显著提升了优化效率和性能，具有实际工业应用价值。

title: Comparative Analysis of Robustness in Data Modeling Under Low-Temperature Versus High-Temperature Environments
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Comparative Analysis of Robustness in Data Modeling Under Low-Temperature Versus High-Temperature Environments
detail.abstract: Thermal robustness improvement is critical to machine tool thermal error compensation. Through extensive long-term experimentation, this study reveals that thermal error models established from low-temperature ambient batches consistently demonstrate superior robust accuracy compared to those from high-temperature conditions. This paper systematically investigates the fundamental basis of thermal robustness models. Our findings indicate that temperature-sensitive points (TSPs) exhibit a significantly stronger correlation with thermal error under lower ambient temperatures, thereby preserving more comprehensive thermal deformation information essential for maintaining prediction accuracy. Meanwhile, contrary to conventional assumptions linking high correlation with pronounced multicollinearity, our comparative analysis of temperature-sensitive points (TSPs) between thermal groups revealed statistically indistinguishable multicollinearity levels. Accordingly, this study establishes a novel ambient temperature selection criterion for constructing thermally robust models, achieving a 50\% improvement in thermal robust accuracy performance (annual average root mean squared error) compared to an inappropriate selection criterion for ambient temperature ranges.

AI.tldr: 通过长期实验发现，低温环境下建立的热误差模型比高温环境下的模型具有更高的鲁棒性。研究发现低温下温度敏感点（TSPs）与热误差的相关性更强，且多共线性水平无明显差异。研究提出了一种新的环境温度选择标准，使热鲁棒性精度提高了50%。
AI.research_question: 如何提高机床热误差补偿的热鲁棒性？
AI.motivation: 热鲁棒性对机床热误差补偿至关重要，但现有模型在不同环境温度下的表现差异显著，需系统性研究其基础。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于温度敏感点（TSPs）与热误差的相关性及多共线性分析。
AI.method: 通过长期实验比较不同环境温度下建立的模型，分析TSPs与热误差的关系及多共线性水平。
AI.findings: 低温环境下TSPs与热误差相关性更强，多共线性水平无明显差异；新环境温度选择标准使热鲁棒性精度提高50%。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了低温环境下TSPs与热误差的更强相关性，挑战了传统高相关性与多共线性的假设。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出了一种新的环境温度选择标准，显著提高了热误差补偿模型的鲁棒性。

title: Criminalising Dissent: A Constitutional Critique of Sedition Law in Contemporary India
affiliations: Hidayatullah National Law University

detail.title: Criminalising Dissent: A Constitutional Critique of Sedition Law in Contemporary India
detail.abstract: This paper presents a critical summary of the author's LL.M. dissertation, which explores the constitutional challenges posed by the continued use of sedition law in India under Section 124A of the Indian Penal Code. It traces the colonial origins of the provision, its judicial interpretation post-independence (especially the Kedar Nath Singh case), and its growing misuse in contemporary times to suppress dissent, journalism, and digital speech. The paper evaluates recent developments including the Supreme Court's 2022 freeze on sedition trials, shifting stances of the Law Commission, and global trends that increasingly favour repealing such laws. Drawing on comparative insights from countries like Germany, South Korea, and the UK, it argues that the sedition law undermines constitutional morality and democratic discourse in India. The author concludes that the law is incompatible with the spirit of the Indian Constitution and should be repealed in favour of narrowly tailored legislation that balances security with civil liberties.

AI.tldr: 本文批判性地总结了作者的LL.M.论文，探讨了印度《刑法》第124A条中煽动叛乱法的持续使用所带来的宪法挑战。文章追溯了该条款的殖民起源、独立后的司法解释（尤其是Kedar Nath Singh案），以及其在当代被滥用以压制异议、新闻和数字言论的现象。论文评估了近期发展，包括最高法院2022年暂停煽动叛乱审判、法律委员会立场的转变，以及全球趋势中越来越多国家倾向于废除此类法律。通过比较德国、韩国和英国等国家的经验，文章认为煽动叛乱法损害了印度的宪法道德和民主话语。作者得出结论，该法律与印度宪法的精神不符，应废除并代之以更精准平衡安全与公民自由的立法。
AI.research_question: 印度《刑法》第124A条中的煽动叛乱法是否与印度宪法的精神兼容？
AI.motivation: 探讨煽动叛乱法的历史、司法实践及其对民主和言论自由的负面影响，为废除该法律提供理论支持。
AI.theoretical_framework: 宪法理论、民主话语理论、比较法研究。
AI.method: 文献分析、案例研究（如Kedar Nath Singh案）、比较法分析（德国、韩国、英国等）。
AI.findings: 煽动叛乱法源于殖民时期，被滥用以压制异议，与宪法精神不符；全球趋势支持废除此类法律。
AI.theory_contributions: 为宪法理论和民主话语理论提供了印度背景下的实证支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为印度废除煽动叛乱法并制定更精准的法律提供了政策建议。

title: Flexible Allocation: Targeting Workforce Planning Problems in Large-Scale Assembly Line Operations Against Demand Uncertainty
affiliations: Dalian Maritime University and Dalian Maritime University

detail.title: Flexible Allocation: Targeting Workforce Planning Problems in Large-Scale Assembly Line Operations Against Demand Uncertainty
detail.abstract: In response to demand uncertainty, workforce allocation has emerged as a critical lever for improving flexibility in human-centered manufacturing systems. Existing studies have recognized the combination of numerical and functional flexibility as an effective strategy. However, research on the joint application of this strategy is mostly confined to the theoretical level, and studies targeting practical application scenarios also primarily rely on static workforce assumptions (such as fixed skill sets and established personnel structures), and lacks dynamic mechanisms for managing multi-skilled internal employees and external temporary workers when coping with uncertainty. To address this gap, this study proposes a multi-objective robust optimization model, which primarily focuses on solving the proper decision-making problem of internal employee capability enhancement and external temporary worker recruitment under the condition of dynamic changes of required skill levels. The model explicitly accounts for uncertainties in task demands. To effectively solve the resulting complex optimization problem, we develop a dual-level reinforcement learning-enhanced multi-objective evolutionary algorithm (RL-NSGA-II-ALNS). This approach adaptively adjusts evolutionary parameters of NSGA-II and controls the invocation of ALNS local search modules based on real-time learning feedback. Simulation results demonstrate that the proposed method outperforms traditional evolutionary algorithms in terms of convergence, solution diversity, and robustness. This study provides an intelligent and adaptive decision-making framework for workforce planning in uncertain and demand-driven manufacturing systems.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种多目标鲁棒优化模型，结合强化学习增强的多目标进化算法（RL-NSGA-II-ALNS），用于动态管理内部员工能力提升和外部临时工招聘，以应对需求不确定性。
AI.research_question: 如何在需求动态变化的制造系统中，优化内部员工能力提升和外部临时工招聘的决策？
AI.motivation: 现有研究多局限于理论层面或静态假设，缺乏动态管理多技能员工和临时工的机制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 多目标鲁棒优化模型与强化学习增强的进化算法。
AI.method: 提出RL-NSGA-II-ALNS算法，动态调整进化参数和局部搜索模块。
AI.findings: 模拟结果显示，该方法在收敛性、解多样性和鲁棒性上优于传统算法。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出动态管理员工和临时工的智能决策框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为需求驱动的制造系统提供了自适应决策工具。

title: Effort Versus Ease: The Impact of Temptation on Perceptions of Virtue
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Boston College

detail.title: Effort Versus Ease: The Impact of Temptation on Perceptions of Virtue
detail.abstract: In a dilemma, who is more commendable: the agent who chooses a more virtuous action after overcoming temptation toward a less virtuous one, or the agent who chooses the same virtuous action without experiencing temptation? Certain studies in the literature have shown evidence supporting both conflicting answers to this question. Others have shown that the answer may depend on whether the dilemma is morally valenced or not. In the current work, we unify and extend the literature for a more complete psychological account of the relationship between temptation and virtue. Study 1 shows that, in moral dilemmas, giving into temptation is a much more influential factor in moral judgement than experiencing temptation. Studies 2 and 3 show that, in non-moral dilemmas, agents who overcome temptation are rated better than untempted agents. This effect is unchanged regardless of whether agents are adults or children, but is diminished when untempted agents lack intentionality in choosing virtuous actions. Study 4 uses a within-subjects design to replicate the effect from Studies 2 and 3 and show that, in moral dilemmas, untempted agents are rated better than agents who overcome temptation. However, the effect in moral dilemmas is more robust than the effect in non-moral dilemmas. Study 4 also links individual preference for the untempted to endorsement of a growth mindset in the moral domain.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了在道德与非道德困境中，诱惑与美德之间的关系。研究发现，在道德困境中，屈服于诱惑对道德判断的影响更大；而在非道德困境中，克服诱惑的个体更受好评。
AI.research_question: 在困境中，克服诱惑选择美德行为的个体与未经历诱惑直接选择美德行为的个体，谁更值得称赞？
AI.motivation: 现有研究对这一问题存在矛盾答案，且可能因困境类型（道德或非道德）而异。本文旨在统一并扩展文献，提供更完整的心理学解释。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于诱惑与美德关系的心理学理论，探讨道德与非道德困境中的行为评价差异。
AI.method: 通过四项研究（1-4）分别分析道德与非道德困境中的行为评价，涉及成人与儿童被试，并考察意图性的影响。
AI.findings: 在道德困境中，屈服于诱惑对评价影响更大；在非道德困境中，克服诱惑的个体更受好评。意图性在非道德困境中起调节作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 统一了现有矛盾研究，提出了困境类型对行为评价的影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为道德教育及行为评价提供了心理学依据，强调困境类型与意图性的重要性。

title: Discord and the Pentagon's Watchdog: Countering Extremism in the U.S. Military
affiliations: Penn State Dickinson Law

detail.title: Discord and the Pentagon's Watchdog: Countering Extremism in the U.S. Military
detail.abstract: In his 2022 book, Ward Farnsworth crafts a metaphor from the lead-pipe theory for the fall of Rome to consider how rage and misinformation traveling through today’s technology-enabled pipes are poisoning our civic engagement and threatening our governmental structures: “We have built networks for the delivery of information––the internet, and especially social media. These networks too, are a marvel. But they also carry a kind of poison with them. The mind fed from those sources learns to subsist happily on quick reactions, easy certainties, one-liners, and rage.” This Article carries the metaphor into a new context and considers what should be done when the poison being transported through the digital pipes is directed at members of the U.S. military. While extremism in the U.S. military is not a new threat, the events of January 6, 2021, brought the threat into much sharper focus. It exposed three preexisting trends, each sitting in plain sight but not yet woven together. These trends include a growing acceptance of extremist views and ideologies in U.S. military and veteran communities, an increase in violent extremist acts committed by individuals with military backgrounds, and the enhanced use of digital platforms by extremist groups to target their messaging to and strengthen their recruitment of individuals with military experience. To return to the metaphor, the extremist poison is teeming through the pipes at an alarming rate, and the number of pipes has increased to include social media platforms, encrypted chat tools, gaming platforms, podcasts, and music streaming apps, including YouTube, Discord, Gab, Telegram, and WhatsApp, among many others. In offering these observations, the author is mindful of not overstating the threat and takes seriously warnings as to the adverse consequences that follow from hyperbole and exaggeration. Indeed, a fundamental difficulty is the lack of understanding as to scope and scale of the extremism threat in the U.S. military. This Article attempts to draw the contours of that threat, exposes the structural and legal obstacles that make countering extremism in the military such a fraught exercise, and identifies actors, tools, and mechanisms—beyond the conventional options––able to overcome these long-standing structural and institutional obstacles.

AI.tldr: 本文通过铅管理论隐喻，探讨了当今技术驱动的信息传播网络如何毒害公民参与并威胁政府结构，特别关注极端主义对美国军方的渗透及其应对策略。
AI.research_question: 当数字管道中的极端主义毒害针对美国军方成员时，应采取何种措施？
AI.motivation: 2021年1月6日事件凸显了美国军方极端主义威胁的严重性，需系统性分析与应对。
AI.theoretical_framework: 铅管理论隐喻，用于分析信息传播网络对极端主义的放大作用。
AI.method: 通过分析现有趋势（极端主义观点接受度上升、军人背景极端暴力行为增加、数字平台被用于招募军人），探讨威胁轮廓及应对障碍。
AI.findings: 极端主义通过社交媒体、加密工具等数字管道快速传播，但威胁范围和规模尚不明确。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了铅管理论的应用，揭示了数字时代极端主义传播的新机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出了超越传统手段的应对策略，包括识别关键行动者、工具和机制。

title: Cutting-Edge Tech Integration in Education and Teaching Practices
affiliations: Allenhouse Business School and Allenhouse Business School

detail.title: Cutting-Edge Tech Integration in Education and Teaching Practices
detail.abstract: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of the intersection between emerging technologies and pedagogical approaches in modern education. It explores how innovations such as Artificial Intelligence (AI), Virtual Reality (VR), gamification, and Learning Management Systems (LMS) are transforming traditional teaching and learning models. Despite the growing adoption of these technologies, there remains a gap in research regarding their long-term effectiveness, the adaptability of educators, and the disparities in access across different educational settings. This study aims to address this gap by identifying the most influential technologies in education, assessing their impact on pedagogical strategies, and examining the challenges educators face in integrating these tools into their practice. Using a secondary research methodology, this study synthesizes existing literature, reports, and case studies to evaluate trends and challenges in educational technology adoption. Key findings indicate that while these technologies offer significant benefits, including personalized learning, increased student engagement, and improved accessibility, their implementation is often hindered by barriers such as resistance to change, infrastructure limitations, and digital equity concerns. The paper highlights the importance of aligning teaching methodologies with technological advancements to foster dynamic, student-centered learning environments. Understanding the intersection of these technologies with contemporary pedagogies is essential for educators, policymakers, and institutions to effectively navigate and adapt to the evolving educational landscape.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了新兴技术与现代教育方法的交叉点，探讨了AI、VR、游戏化和LMS等技术如何改变传统教学模式，并指出研究空白。通过二次研究方法，研究发现这些技术虽有益处，但实施面临挑战。
AI.research_question: 新兴技术如何影响现代教育的教学方法？
AI.motivation: 尽管新兴技术在教育中的应用日益广泛，但对其长期效果、教师适应性和教育环境差异的研究仍不足。
AI.theoretical_framework: 教育技术理论、个性化学习理论、学生参与理论。
AI.method: 采用二次研究方法，综合现有文献、报告和案例研究。
AI.findings: 新兴技术带来个性化学习、学生参与度提升等益处，但实施中面临教师抵触、基础设施不足和数字公平问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了新兴技术与现代教育方法交叉研究的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为教育者、政策制定者和机构提供了技术整合的实践指导。

title: Brain Drain or Brain Dilution Tax: A Sending Country's Perspective
affiliations: National Research University Higher School of Economics

detail.title: Brain Drain or Brain Dilution Tax: A Sending Country's Perspective
detail.abstract: I investigate how taxing immigrants and redistributing the collected funds as educational subsidies influence human capital accumulation and growth in the source economy. The analysis is performed in a two-country growth model with endogenous fertility, in which public knowledge spillovers from the more advanced destination economy amplify the productivity of investment in children’s education in the sending country. I demonstrate that, while in the short run, the source economy accumulates more human capital if the subsidies are provided domestically, if the spillover effect is strong enough, in the long run, it can accumulate more human capital if education is subsidized in the destination country.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了通过对移民征税并将资金作为教育补贴重新分配，如何影响来源经济体的人力资本积累和增长。研究发现，短期内补贴国内教育能积累更多人力资本，但若知识溢出效应足够强，长期补贴目的地国教育可能更有效。
AI.research_question: 征税移民并将资金作为教育补贴重新分配如何影响来源经济体的人力资本积累和增长？
AI.motivation: 探讨公共知识溢出效应在人力资本积累中的作用，以及补贴分配对长期增长的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 两国内生增长模型，包含内生生育率和公共知识溢出效应。
AI.method: 理论模型分析，比较不同补贴分配方案对人力资本积累的短期和长期影响。
AI.findings: 短期内补贴国内教育更有效，但若知识溢出效应强，长期补贴目的地国教育可能更优。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了知识溢出效应在人力资本积累中的关键作用，拓展了内生增长理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于教育补贴分配策略的决策依据。

title: Resilient and Sustainable Recycling Network for Chemical Materials in E-Waste: A Fourth-Party Logistics Perspective
affiliations: Liaoning Petrochemical University, Liaoning Petrochemical University, Liaoning Petrochemical University, Liaoning Petrochemical University, Shenzhen University, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University and Liaoning Petrochemical University

detail.title: Resilient and Sustainable Recycling Network for Chemical Materials in E-Waste: A Fourth-Party Logistics Perspective
detail.abstract: The increasing quantity of electronic waste (e-waste) poses growing environmental pressures and resource shortages for manufacturers, attracting widespread attention to the benefits of product recycling. To improve recycling efficiency, this paper investigates a novel resilient and sustainable e-waste recycling network design problem from the 4PL perspective, proposing an innovative framework to optimize e-waste recycling management. Resilience strategies integrating multi-level fortification, capacity backup, multi-sourcing, temporary outsourcing, and multiple transportation routes are used to mitigate disruption risks and ensure a stable supply of raw materials for enterprises. A new two-stage stochastic 4PL network design model for e-waste recycling is proposed, using a scenario-based approach to characterize disruption scenarios. To address the challenges posed by large-scale scenarios to solution performance, this paper proposes a scenario sorting method to improve the dual decomposition Lagrangian relaxation (DDLR) algorithm and combines it with the scenario reduction (SR) method to propose a new algorithm framework, SR-IDDLR, to solve this problem. The applicability of the proposed model is illustrated using a real case study from a home appliance recycling company in northern Turkey, and sensitivity analysis is conducted on important parameters such as the minimum recycling rate to provide management insights for 4PLs.

AI.tldr: 本文从第四方物流（4PL）视角研究了一种新型的电子废物（e-waste）回收网络设计问题，提出了一种创新的框架以优化回收管理。通过整合多级防御、能力备份、多源采购、临时外包和多条运输路线等韧性策略，降低中断风险并确保企业原材料供应稳定。提出了一种新的两阶段随机4PL网络设计模型，并改进了算法框架（SR-IDDLR）以解决大规模场景下的计算挑战。通过土耳其北部一家家电回收公司的案例验证了模型的适用性。
AI.research_question: 如何从4PL视角设计一种韧性和可持续的电子废物回收网络，以优化回收管理并降低中断风险？
AI.motivation: 电子废物数量不断增加，对环境压力和资源短缺问题日益严重，亟需提高回收效率。
AI.theoretical_framework: 4PL视角下的电子废物回收网络设计理论，韧性策略理论（多级防御、能力备份等），两阶段随机规划模型。
AI.method: 提出两阶段随机4PL网络设计模型，采用基于场景的方法描述中断情景；改进DDLR算法并结合SR方法提出SR-IDDLR算法框架。
AI.findings: 通过案例验证了模型的适用性，并提供了关于最低回收率等重要参数的管理见解。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了4PL视角下的电子废物回收网络设计理论框架，改进了算法以解决大规模问题。
AI.practical_contributions: 为4PL提供了优化电子废物回收管理的实践策略，并通过案例验证了其可行性。

title: Mf-Mamba: Multi-Module Feature Selection Mamba for Metro Origin-Destination Matrix Prediction
affiliations: Southwest Jiaotong University, Southwest Jiaotong University - School of Transportation and Logistics, Southwest Jiaotong University, Southwest Jiaotong University - School of Transportation and Logistics and Southwest Jiaotong University

detail.title: Mf-Mamba: Multi-Module Feature Selection Mamba for Metro Origin-Destination Matrix Prediction
detail.abstract: Accurate Origin-Destination (OD) matrix prediction is crucial in realizing intelligent urban rail transit systems and improving public transportation service quality. However, OD matrix prediction faces several key challenges: (1) high-dimensional sparsity and imbalanced distribution of data, (2) monotonous feature representation, (3) exponential growth of computational complexity with matrix size, and (4) insufficient model interpretability. To address these challenges, this paper proposes a novel feature selection Mamba model based on multimodule architecture and state-space modeling (MF-Mamba). The model incorporates three key innovations: First, it implements a multi-module parallel architecture to process heterogeneous data including spatial geometric information and temporal numerical features, effectively mitigating the data sparsity issue. Second, it introduces an adaptive feature selection mechanism that learns the contribution weights of different features, simultaneously enhancing both prediction accuracy and model interpretability. Finally, it constructs a sequence modeling module based on the state-of-the-art Mamba state-space model to efficiently capture both long- and short-term temporal dependencies in OD matrices. Extensive experiments on a large-scale real-world dataset from Shenzhen Metro demonstrate that MF-Mamba significantly outperforms existing baseline methods across multiple evaluation metrics, particularly achieving accurate predictions for high-traffic routes. This research provides reliable technical support and practical reference for intelligent operation management of urban rail transit systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于多模块架构和状态空间建模的特征选择Mamba模型（MF-Mamba），用于解决OD矩阵预测中的高维稀疏性、特征表示单调、计算复杂度高和模型可解释性不足等问题。实验证明其在深圳地铁数据集上显著优于现有方法。
AI.research_question: 如何解决OD矩阵预测中的高维稀疏性、特征表示单调、计算复杂度高和模型可解释性不足等关键挑战？
AI.motivation: 准确的OD矩阵预测对实现智能城市轨道交通系统和提升公共交通服务质量至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于多模块并行架构、自适应特征选择机制和Mamba状态空间模型的序列建模模块。
AI.method: 提出MF-Mamba模型，结合多模块并行架构、自适应特征选择和Mamba状态空间模型。
AI.findings: 在深圳地铁数据集上，MF-Mamba显著优于现有基线方法，尤其在高流量路线的预测上表现优异。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种新的特征选择Mamba模型，解决了OD矩阵预测中的多个关键问题。
AI.practical_contributions: 为城市轨道交通系统的智能运营管理提供了可靠的技术支持和实践参考。

title: A Deep Evidence Mining Approach for Trustworthy Open-Set Fault Diagnosis of Rotating Machinery
affiliations: Hangzhou Dianzi University, Hangzhou Dianzi University, Zhejiang University of Technology, Hangzhou Dianzi University, Hangzhou Dianzi University and Zhejiang University

detail.title: A Deep Evidence Mining Approach for Trustworthy Open-Set Fault Diagnosis of Rotating Machinery
detail.abstract: Fault diagnosis of rotating machinery is crucial for ensuring the reliability and safety of industrial operations. Traditional deep learning-based methods for fault diagnosis typically operate under closed-set conditions, assuming that all fault types are known during training. However, in real-world scenarios, new and previously unseen fault types can emerge, leading to incorrect diagnoses. This paper proposes a novel deep evidence mining framework to enhance the trustworthiness of open-set fault diagnosis in rotating machinery. The framework integrates evidence theory with deep learning, enabling the model to extract and quantify evidence from input data. A multi-layer evidence mining paradigm is introduced to guide feature extraction towards evidence acquisition, improving the model's adaptability to complex architectures. A candidate model based on time-frequency feature fusion is constructed to validate the proposed framework. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed method effectively captures both spectral and temporal characteristics of vibration signals, achieving accurate fault diagnosis while maintaining robustness against unknown fault types.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于深度证据挖掘的框架，用于提高旋转机械开放式故障诊断的可信度，结合证据理论与深度学习，有效处理未知故障类型。
AI.research_question: 如何在开放式条件下提高旋转机械故障诊断的可信度？
AI.motivation: 实际工业场景中可能出现未知故障类型，传统深度学习方法在封闭集条件下无法有效应对。
AI.theoretical_framework: 证据理论与深度学习的结合。
AI.method: 提出多层证据挖掘范式，构建基于时频特征融合的候选模型。
AI.findings: 实验结果表明，该方法能有效捕捉振动信号的频谱和时域特征，对未知故障类型具有鲁棒性。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种新的深度证据挖掘框架，扩展了开放式故障诊断的理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 为工业旋转机械的故障诊断提供了更可靠的解决方案。

title: Managing Prominence within a Retail Platform
affiliations: Advanced Institute of Business, Tongji University, Shanghai, China and University of Minnesota - Twin Cities - Carlson School of Management

detail.title: Managing Prominence within a Retail Platform
detail.abstract: In online markets, consumers tend to search and purchase prominently positioned products. Many retail platforms passively allocate the prominent positions by selling them to sellers in exchange for advertising revenue (i.e., advertiser-driven model). Otherwise, a platform can actively select sellers at the prominent positions to maximize its profit from commission (i.e., platform-guided model). How does different ways of managing prominence affect the strategic interactions between sellers? When and why can the platform benefit more from advertiser-driven model than platform-guided one? We answer these questions with a game-theoretical model that features competing asymmetric sellers and consumer heterogeneity over brand preferences and search costs. We find that when the platform sells prominence, the strong (weak) seller is more likely to take the prominent position when search cost is high (low), both sellers' valuations towards the prominence may present a non-monotonic relationship with the search cost, and counterintuitively, the weak seller might even form a negative valuation towards prominence in some cases. In contrast, the platform is more likely to place the strong seller at the prominent position, regardless of the level of search cost, when selecting the prominent seller itself. Surprisingly, under certain scenarios, the platform-guided model, which sacrifices the platform's advertising revenue in exchange for a better control over sellers' pricing, can result in more intensified competition between sellers and therefore can be strictly dominated by the advertiser-driven model.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了在线市场中平台如何管理显著位置（广告驱动模型与平台引导模型）对卖家策略互动的影响，发现不同搜索成本下卖家对显著位置的估值可能呈现非单调关系，且平台引导模型在某些情况下可能被广告驱动模型严格主导。
AI.research_question: 不同管理显著位置的方式如何影响卖家之间的策略互动？平台在何种情况下能从广告驱动模型中获益更多？
AI.motivation: 在线市场中，消费者倾向于购买显著位置的产品，平台管理显著位置的方式可能影响卖家行为和平台利润。
AI.theoretical_framework: 博弈论模型，考虑不对称卖家和消费者在品牌偏好及搜索成本上的异质性。
AI.method: 使用博弈论模型分析卖家竞争和消费者行为。
AI.findings: 广告驱动模型中，强（弱）卖家在高（低）搜索成本下更可能占据显著位置；卖家对显著位置的估值可能与搜索成本呈非单调关系；平台引导模型中，平台倾向于选择强卖家。在某些情况下，平台引导模型可能被广告驱动模型严格主导。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了卖家对显著位置的非单调估值行为及平台引导模型的潜在劣势。
AI.practical_contributions: 为平台选择管理显著位置的策略提供了理论依据，帮助优化利润。

title: The Echo of the Engine: A Comparative Historical Analysis of Technological Disruption and the Future of Work in the Age of AI
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: The Echo of the Engine: A Comparative Historical Analysis of Technological Disruption and the Future of Work in the Age of AI
detail.abstract: This paper investigates the contemporary labor market implications of Artificial Intelligence (AI) through a comparative historical analysis of three major technological epochs: the First and Second Industrial Revolutions, the Information Age, and the nascent AI Revolution. The central thesis posits that while the fundamental economic pattern of "creative destruction"-entailing short-term job displacement followed by long-term net job creation and productivity growth-remains a constant, the AI revolution presents a historically unique challenge due to its unprecedented velocity of diffusion and its capacity to automate non-routine cognitive tasks. The methodology involves a qualitative synthesis of economic history, labor market data, and institutional reports to identify recurring dynamics and critical distinctions across these eras. Key findings indicate a consistent pattern of task reallocation over job elimination, persistent skills gaps driving transitional inequality, and the critical role of policy and institutional adaptation in mitigating social costs. The paper concludes that the societal impact of AI is not technologically determined but will be shaped by strategic choices in education, corporate governance, and social policy. It identifies key limitations, including the predictive uncertainty of historical analogies, and proposes future research directions focused on the efficacy of retraining programs and the evolving nature of human-AI collaboration.

AI.tldr: 本文通过比较历史分析探讨了人工智能（AI）对当代劳动力市场的影响，指出AI革命因其快速扩散和自动化非例行认知任务的能力而带来独特挑战，但基本经济模式仍是“创造性破坏”。研究发现任务重新分配而非岗位消除是常态，技能差距导致不平等，政策与制度适应至关重要。
AI.research_question: 人工智能对当代劳动力市场的具体影响是什么？与其他技术革命时期有何异同？
AI.motivation: 探讨AI革命对劳动力市场的独特挑战，揭示历史模式与当前差异，为政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 创造性破坏理论、技术扩散理论、劳动力市场动态理论。
AI.method: 定性综合经济历史、劳动力市场数据和机构报告的比较历史分析。
AI.findings: 任务重新分配而非岗位消除是常态，技能差距导致不平等，政策与制度适应是关键。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证创造性破坏理论的普适性，提出AI革命独特性的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为教育、企业治理和社会政策提供战略建议，强调政策与制度适应的重要性。

title: Sync or Swim: Day-to-Day Work Scheduling and Coordination in Remote Work
affiliations: Stanford University

detail.title: Sync or Swim: Day-to-Day Work Scheduling and Coordination in Remote Work
detail.abstract: This paper examines how individuals allocate their working time across different days of the week in the era of hybrid and remote work. Using the American Time Use Survey (ATUS) and the Dingel-Neiman measure of occupational remotability, I document systematic intraweek variation in work hours and work location. Remote-capable workers are more likely to work from home on certain days-particularly Fridays-and adjust their daily schedules in ways consistent with lower coordination demands. In contrast, workers in on-site jobs exhibit relatively uniform patterns across weekdays. Building on theories of time allocation, organizational coordination, and task interdependence, I interpret these patterns as reflecting a trade-off between the flexibility afforded by remote work and the benefits of synchronous, in-person collaboration. I complement this analysis with recent quasi-experimental evidence on hybrid scheduling and macro-level findings on the spatial effects of remote work.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了混合和远程工作时代个体如何在一周的不同天分配工作时间。研究发现，远程工作者更倾向于在特定日子（尤其是周五）在家工作，并根据协调需求调整日程；而现场工作者则表现出相对均匀的工作模式。
AI.research_question: 个体在混合和远程工作时代如何在一周的不同天分配工作时间？
